Text.Page:
For a well-travelled path, this stretch of road is a little dangerous.

If I could build fences along the path, it would slow down most of the predators.

Local woodcutters chopped down some trees for me, but I need someone to fetch the timber. Can you help?
Thanks, this is exactly what I need. I'll get started building those fences first thing.
It breaks my heart to see the master so down. Shevranberries will make him feel much better. I am sure of it!
